akn:section.akn:heading: Aviation cadets and aviation students: schools

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 9403. Aviation cadets and aviation students: schools The Secretary of the Air Force shall establish and maintain—(1) one or more schools for the training and instruction of aviation cadets; and
(2) courses of instruction for aviation students at one or more established flying schools.
(Aug. 10, 1956, ch. 1041, 70A Stat. 560, § 9303; renumbered § 9403, Pub. L. 115–232, div. A, title VIII, § 806(a)(3), Aug. 13, 2018, 132 Stat. 1832.)
